title: Playground, Elegant Crown Molding, Hardwood Style Flooring
posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'At River Vista, our residents will have access to a wide variety of amenities that are suitable for every lifestyle.', 'With community amenities like a large swimming pool, a fitness center, and an outdoor kitchen, residents of our Sandy Springs luxury apartments will have access to everything they need.', 'Each of our one bedroom, two bedroom, and three bedroom homes at our apartments in Sandy Springs, GA will feature a private balcony and elegant crown molding.', 'Aside from our amazing amenities, we also offer an ideal location.', 'Our Sandy Springs apartments are near the best that the city has to offer, as well as easy access to the Atlanta area.', 'Start living a life of ease and come home to our luxury apartments in Sandy Springs, GA.', 'Schedule your visit to River Vista today!', 'Amenities:', '-Swimming', 'Pool with Sundeck Seating', '-Outdoor Social Area with T.V.', '-Elegant Crown Molding', '-Built-In Shelving', '-Playground', '-Two-tone Paint', '-Brushed Nickel Hardware & Fixtures', '-Private Patio or Balcony with Additional Storage', '-24-Hour Strength & Cardio Fitness Center', '-Built-In Media Cabinet', '-Granite Kitchen Countertops', '-Espresso Cabinetry', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
